sql:
SELECT
	id,
	id_tx,
	tx_no,
	name,
	address,
	postal,
	nric,
	mobile,
	tel,
	email,
	doc_upload,
	office_tel,
	remarks,
	doc_name,
	cus_type,
	trade,
	contact_person,
	destination,
	contact_email,
	biz_email,
	last_updated,
	contact_person_id,
	contact_person_cell,
	salutation,
	id_type,
	country_incorporation,
	`role`,
	category,
	tel_type,
	billing_address,
	billing_postal,
	reg_date,
	registration_no,
	custid,
	tx_address,
	representing,
	marketing_rights
FROM
	parties_involved
ORDER BY
	id DESC
name: parties_involved
